name: systemCacheClear
description: Clears all caches or the specified cache

params.name: cacheName
params.description: Name of the cache you want to clear. If not specified it will clear all caches.
values: component, cfc or class (clears component path cache)
customtag or ct (clears customtag path cache)
tag (clears cfml/cfc based built in tag cache)
function (clears cfml based built in function cache)
